tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE trading_strategy_performance (
    strategy_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    end_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    total_trades INT,
    total_profit DECIMAL(10, 2),
    success_rate DECIMAL(5, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE trading_activity (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    trade_type VARCHAR(50),
    trade_volume INT
);

CREATE TABLE trade_execution (
    trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_id INT,
    symbol VARCHAR(10),
    trade_date TIMESTAMP,
    quantity INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    executed_by VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    strategy_id INT,
    trade_id INT,
    gain_loss DECIMAL(10, 2),
    win_rate FLOAT,
    max_drawdown DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE trades (
    trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_id INT NOT NULL,
    trade_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    trade_type VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    trade_qty INT NOT NULL,
    trade_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_id INT NOT NULL,
    metric_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    metric_value DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    metric_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Strategy (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 description TEXT,
 created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW()
)

CREATE TABLE Trade (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 strategy_id INT NOT NULL,
 symbol VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
 quantity INT NOT NULL,
 price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
 executed_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW()
)

CREATE TABLE Performance (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 strategy_id INT NOT NULL,
 total_profit DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
 total_trades INT NOT NULL,
 average_profit DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE MarketData (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 symbol VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
 price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
 volume INT NOT NULL,
 last_updated TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW()
)

CREATE TABLE Risk (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 strategy_id INT NOT NULL,
 risk_level INT NOT NULL,
 risk_description TEXT,
 risk_date DATE NOT NULL
)
